name: Sub Strike
description:
Homage to some very old submarine arcade games from the late 70s.

Control the warship floating above hazardous waters infested with enemy subs. Drop depth charges and avoid mines floating to the surface.

Subs with red flashing cannot be destroyed and release more mines than standard subs.

Controls

move left & rightARROW KEYSfire left / rightX / Cquit gameQ
